Text:
Very good video but sound is really poor. Sometimes it's hard to hear what anybody is saying
Also, Austrian speech is in German subtitles so you have no idea what people are saying during these sections
Good movie, but not as good as Borat!

English subs for the Austrian parts:
http://subscene.com/Bruno/subtitles-77668.aspx

This was very watchable and the sound wasn't bad at all, as for the German parts... THATS THE POINT, Bruno is Austrian duuuuuuuh *makes downs syndrome style dribbling*

Anyway, for a handheld it's very good and saved me a trip to the cinema.
video is pish like was exspecting much better n alot funnier
dog wank picture and sound is shit dont waste your time with this bullshit

Saw this movie at the cinema... Fucking hell Sacha! What absolute crap!!! 

Big fan of Ali G, Borat and a few other things, but this? RUBBISH!
Do you really think we want to give all of our most personal details so we can be bombarded with sales pests. Why ? when we can just download for free on here !
